attributes.action: Abolish the legislative changes on the surrender of road tax due Janruary 09
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As from Janruary 08 the motor trade can not surrender road tax disks taken from part exchange vechicles and claim a refund of duty.This has been a source of income to the motor trade for many years.At this difficult trading time when the government are offering to help small business's this is just another blow.Under the new scheme the car trade would need to add its name to the  list of owners in the v5.this would devalue the vechicle.I dont believe the admin person that thought up this change gave the matter much thouht.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish the legislative changes on the surrender of road tax due Janruary 09."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18840


Prime Minister's Office
